Text:
Hi Steeler!  It's great to see you again!  I know you aren't taking requests, but is there any way you could re-upload some of your fantastic criterions that we couldn't finish?  Such as pina, green for danger, the friends of eddie coyle, the fire within, charade and stray dogs?

I know it's asking a lot, and understand if you don't.  I will be sure to seed!
@rasspitan Yes! I'm going to re-upload those. Thank you for your support!
@rasspitan I'm going to have some great Criterion's coming soon. Some of them are out of print!
@steeler - and that's why we love you so much!  Any and all criterion are welcome in my book!
Thank you! Thank you!! Thank you!!!
